TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Truwan, title = Truwan, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Truwan} }

S.FORM: truwan Itiniay i Ren'ai Cen no Nantou ko truwan a niyaro', 60 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 167 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 97% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 162 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 3% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 5 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Seediq81%, Tayal11%, Bunun4%,roma1%.

trowan Itiniay i Ren'ai Cen no Nantoo ko trowan a niyaro', 60 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 167 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 97% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 162 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 3% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 5 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Seediq81%, Tayal11%, Bonon4%,roma1%.
